p: The following reagents: gallic acid (Sigma-Aldrich, Saint Louis, USA), Folin-Ciocalteu (F-C) reagent (Chempur, Piekary Śląskie, Poland), Sodium carbonate anhydrous, pure per analysis (Chempur, Piekary Śląskie, Poland), methanol, pure per analysis (Polish Reagents, Gliwice, Poland), redistilled water were used in analysis.
